title: The Favorites - NFL Wildcard Weekend Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Wildcard Weekend Gambling Preview
description:
The playoffs are finally here! After an extra long NFL regular season, a postseason full of intrigue kicks off on Saturday, and Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network are here to break it all down. Producer Matt's beloved Buffalo Bills host the New England Patriots in a thrilling Saturday night matchup, we have the Eagles soaring to Tampa, and so much more. The guys go through every game and make their favorite early week bets, as they narrow down their betting card for an exhilarating weekend of action.

CIN LV - 12 MIN

BUF NE - 15 MIN

PHL TB - 21 MIN

SF DAL - 29 MIN

PIT KC - 35 MIN

AZ LAR - 49 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
